General_Description: '''Estate Envy''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Go to the largest and most lavish house in [[Mykonos City]]. I am located on a table in a bath filled with red flower petals. Such a great view of the sea.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
